languages.text: Бездумные окуляры сервитора напоминают вам линзы темных очков, за которыми Владайм любил скрывать свои эмоции. Теперь ему скрывать нечего.

traits.locale_text: Бездумные окуляры сервитора напоминают вам линзы темных очков, за которыми Владайм любил скрывать свои эмоции. Теперь ему скрывать нечего.

languages.text: The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.
languages.original_text: Бездумные окуляры сервитора напоминают вам линзы темных очков, за которыми Владайм любил скрывать свои эмоции. Теперь ему скрывать нечего.

traits.locale_text: The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the lenses of the dark glasses behind which Vladaym liked to hide his emotions. He has nothing to hide now.
The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the lenses of the dark glasses behind which Vladaym liked to hide his emotions. He has nothing to hide now.
The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.
The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.
The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.

languages.text: 这个机仆毫无意识的眼神，让你想起了弗拉迪姆用来隐藏情绪的墨镜。不过，他现在已经没什么好隐藏的了。
languages.original_text: The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.

traits.locale_text: 这个奴工毫无意识的眼神，让你想起了弗拉迪姆用来隐藏情绪的墨镜。不过，他现在已经没什么好隐藏的了。

languages.text: Les yeux sans vie du servitor vous rappellent les lunettes noires derrière lesquelles Vladaym dissimulait ses émotions. Il n'a plus rien à cacher, maintenant.
languages.original_text: The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.

traits.locale_text: Les yeux sans vie du servitor vous rappellent les lunettes noires derrière lesquelles Vladaym dissimulait ses émotions. Il n'a plus rien à cacher, maintenant.

languages.text: サーヴィターの心無き眼は、ヴラダイムが感情をその裏側に隠していたサングラスを思い起こさせる。彼にはもう隠し事はない。
languages.original_text: The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.

traits.locale_text: サーヴィターの心無き眼は、ヴラダイムが感情をその裏側に隠していたサングラスを思い起こさせる。彼にはもう隠し事はない。

languages.text: Los sensores oculares del servidor te recuerdan a las gafas oscuras con las que Vladaym ocultaba sus emociones. Ahora no tiene nada que ocultar.
languages.original_text: The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.

traits.locale_text: Los sensores oculares del servidor te recuerdan a las gafas oscuras con las que Vladaym ocultaba sus emociones. Ahora no tiene nada que ocultar.

languages.text: Die stumpfen Okulare des Servitors erinnern dich an die dunkle Brille, hinter der Vladaym seine Emotionen versteckt hat. Er hat nun nichts mehr zu verbergen.
languages.original_text: The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.

traits.locale_text: Die stumpfen Okulare des Servitors erinnern dich an die dunkle Brille, hinter der Vladaym seine Emotionen versteckt hat. Er hat nun nichts mehr zu verbergen.

languages.text: Hizmetörün cansız gözleri, sana Vladaym'ın duygularını belli etmemek üzere kullandığı kara gözlükleri hatırlatıyor. Artık saklayacak bir şeyi yok.
languages.original_text: The servitor's mindless oculars remind you of the dark glasses Vladaym concealed his emotions behind. He has nothing to hide now.
